name: Rowboat
speed: 3 miles per hour (72 miles per day)
conditionImmune: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, incapacitated, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, prone, stunned, unconscious

text: On its turn, the rowboat can take the move action below. It can't take this action if it has no crew.
â€¢ Move. The rowboat can move using its oars.

description:
The humble rowboat serves to ferry passengers back and forth from larger ships or to navigate lakes and rivers. Due to its simple, versatile design, a rowboat has no decks or typical crew. Weighing 100 pounds, a rowboat is easy to transport and might be carried by larger ships.
Source: Ghosts of Saltmarsh p. 190
